text: Edgar Allen Poe is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithEdgar Allan PoeKevin J. Hayes, University Kevin J Hayes. The Cambridge Companion to Edgar Allan Poe and stars Herbert Yost, Linda Arvidson, and Arthur V. Johnson. ==Actors== * Herbert Yost as Edgar Allan Poe * Linda Arvidson as Virginia Poe * Arthur V. Johnson as publisher at first office * Charles Perley as "Resident poet" at first office * David Miles as publisher at second office * Anita Hendrie as editor at second office ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D.
